name: Your Mom's House VR
description:
Your Mom's House was a VR project made for the Oculus Rift at Simon Fraser University for a Immersive VIrtual Reality Environments class. This project was conceived and designed in a team of four in 4 months.

The Your Mom's House development team is:

Nicholas Ramsay:  Team Leader | Programmer

Bob Wang: 3D Modeler | Level Designer

Jimmy Tse: Unity Developer 

Carmen Li: 3D Modeler | Animator

If you have fun with the game, please let us know. If you absolutely hated the experience, let us know also. We're always eager to find new ways to improve the game.
